articles.title: Sir Ian McKellen Walks S.S.DALEY FW23 Runway at LFW - HYPEBEAST
articles.description: Painting an emotional picture of Queer identities, sailors, and life at sea in a step that saw the designer grow.
articles.content:
It’s a tall order to follow the majesty that is a live reading performed by Sir Ian McKellen, but Steven Stokey-Daley under his eponymous label S.S.DALEY proved it possible.
